item.title: Continuous Delivery for personal projects
item.description: If you are like me you build side projects from time to time. Some of them are application running on a server. This led me to the question what is a lightweight and simple way to deploy those application. Do I need to setup a full CI/CD pipeline? Well after all these are often heavy tools to run production grade software. Maybe a simple script is good enough for my use-case?

item.title: About
item.description: I’m a software developer interested with everything that goes along with software. I enjoy learning about following topics most: Software Design, Programming Language Design, System Design, Lisp (Clojure in particular). Here I learn to write and collect/share things I learned. I’m not a native speaker so pardon me for any mistakes I make.
